about_the_game:
Return to 1920s Los Angeles in this continuation of the thrilling romances in SPEAKEASY.

Vincent Harlowe, Milo Harlowe, Silas Rhone, Will Durant, Dahlia Reyes, Maxim Yurov, and Nika Drozdov are all back in this fandisk to continue their happy ends with you.

The game features two after stories for each route, plus a selection of additional stories set in the past or after alternate endings.

  • 18 kinetic novel stories (6 SFW and 12 NSFW)

  • 60,000 words (about 5 hours of gameplay)

  • Music player featuring the full soundtrack from SPEAKEASY

  • New sprite art with fully nude characters

  • Main character name customization

  • Momo's Dressing Room: an interactive dress up game with Momo the tiger

SON-IN-LAW: Milo Harlowe

Milo has won your heart, but can he win the approval of Archie and Florence West?

SFW, GxB

CHRISTMAS RIBBON: Milo Harlowe

Milo gets unexpectedly wrapped up in the excitement of Christmas morning.

NSFW, GxB, Contains: bondage, sensory deprivation.

KITTEN RESCUE: Silas Rhone

Silas takes control in an emergency and shows you all over again why you fell in love.

SFW, GxB

PAINTING MEMORIES: Silas Rhone

Silas, haunted by memories stained in ink, is shown a new way to see his body.

NSFW, GxB, Contains: mentions of childhood trauma.

TENDER PREMONITION: Dahlia Reyes

Dahlia makes an excuse to get out of work for a day out with her favorite girl.

SFW, GxG

ROOFTOP RENDEZVOUS: Dahlia Reyes

One thing leads to another when you and Dahlia enjoy some time together on the speakeasy's roof.

NSFW, GxG, Contains: semi-public sex.

MIDNIGHT BEACH DATE: Will Durant

See Will's romantic and generous sides during an impromptu date.

SFW, GxB

THE FULL SERVICE: Will Durant

Give Will a taste of the services he was previously too shy to order in his private booth.

NSFW, GxB. Contains: prostitution roleplay, semi-public sex.

DINNER PARTY: Maxim Yurov & Nika Drozdov

Tired of Nika feeling left out, you decide to show off the love you share with your two husbands for all to see.

SFW, GxBxB

A PRIVATE PERFORMANCE: Maxim Yurov & Nika Drozdov

After a nightmare, you and Maxim comfort Nika the best ways you know how.

NSFW, GxBxB, Contains: portrayal of symptoms of PTSD.

PAJAMA DAY: Vincent Harlowe

Vincent receives some bad news, so you make sure his day is filled with the things and people he loves.

SFW, GxB

MY SWEET VALENTINE: Vincent Harlowe

Vincent has a special Valentine's Day planned with a gift you'll never expect.

NSFW, GxB, Contains: portrayal of historical prejudices against women.

KISSING BOOTH: Vincent & Nika

Vincent gets intimately acquainted with a new member of the staff in this story.

NSFW, BxB, Contains: prostitution, dubcon roleplay, bondage, brat taming.

PRACTICE HARDER: Maxim & Nika

Maxim and Nika have a fiery practice session in the Yurov Ballet studio.

NSFW, BxB, Contains: fighting.

A DREAMY FANTASY: Silas & Milo

Become the center of attention in this dreamy threesome with best friends Milo and Silas.

NSFW, GxBxB, Contains: threesome.

QUIET: Maxim & Vincent

Maxim and Vincent find a sexy way to relieve stress at work.

NSFW, BxB, Contains: dubcon roleplay.

TWO HARLOWES: Vincent & Milo

Enjoy both Harlowe men in this boundary-pushing story of taboo roleplay.

NSFW, GxBxB, Contains: threesome, sex toy, family roleplay.

THE KING'S CHAIR: Harem

A curious delivery from a speakeasy VIP leads to a delicious threesome with Vincent and Maxim.

NSFW, GxBxB, Contains: threesome, props, masturbation.

This game is intended for mature audiences. It contains alcohol use, tobacco use, and mentions of illegal drug use, childhood trauma, and symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder.

It features explicit sexual content depicted through text and images. Sexual activities explored within the game include: sensory deprivation, bondage, prostitution, family roleplay, use of toys and other props, dubcon roleplay, brat taming, fighting, masturbation, semi-public sex, and group sex. There are GxB, BxB, and GxG pairings, plus group scenarios. Reading through the story descriptions prior to purchase is strongly recommended.


December 10, 2024 - SPEAKEASY: LAST CALL Version 1.1 Release Notes

A new version of SPEAKEASY: LAST CALL has been released, featuring a bug fix and minor updates. Details:

  • Fixed bug in "Painting Memories" story where one line used the default main character name in error instead of the custom character name

  • Added "Back" button to the "Stories" menu screen

  • Updated "Back" button in the "Credits" screen

  • Added version number information to the "Settings" screen

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 461 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 461 MB available space

name: SPEAKEASY: Last Call

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 461 MB available space

short_description: Return to 1920s Los Angeles for more romance in this fandisk for the otome SPEAKEASY.
